attributes.definition: {"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The individual receiving medical care or services.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The date on which the patient is admitted to the healthcare facility.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The date on which the patient is formally discharged from the healthcare facility.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "Healthcare professionals or entities that provide health services.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The primary doctor responsible for a patient's care in a hospital.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The healthcare provider that offers a range of basic health services and is typically the first point of contact.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The individual or entity that owns an insurance policy.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "An individual who has an insurance policy.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "Individuals covered by the policyholder's health plan.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The amount paid for an insurance policy.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The amount paid each month for health insurance coverage.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "Financial assistance to help lower the cost of health insurance premiums.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The process of getting approval from a health plan to cover a specific service or medication.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "A number that signifies approval for a specific procedure or service.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The date until which the pre-authorization is valid.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "A healthcare provider contracted with an insurance plan to provide services.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "A fixed amount a plan member pays for covered healthcare services from an in-network provider.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The cost of services from a provider not in the insurance network.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The identification of a disease or condition by a doctor.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The distinguishing of a particular disease or condition from others with similar symptoms.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The likely course and outcome of a disease.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "A detailed plan outlining a patient's course of treatment, including objectives, strategies, and expected timeframes.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "A treatment or action taken to improve a health problem.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The length of time a treatment is to be administered.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "A medical code set that is used to report medical, surgical, and diagnostic procedures and services.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "A unique number that corresponds to a medical service based on the CPT code system.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "An addition to a CPT code that indicates a service has been altered in a specific way.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "A request for payment that a healthcare provider submits to an insurer after delivering services to a patient.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "Indicates where in the process a claim is, such as received, pending, or paid.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "The explanation provided when a claim is not approved for payment.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "U.S. legislation that provides data privacy and security provisions for safeguarding medical information.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "Any information about health status, provision of healthcare, or payment for healthcare that can be linked to an individual.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "An impermissible use or disclosure under the Privacy Rule that compromises the security or privacy of PHI.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "Comprehensive health care reform law enacted in March 2010, also known as Obamacare.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "A set of healthcare service categories that must be covered by certain plans.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}

{"root": {"children": [{"children": [{"detail": 0, "format": 0, "mode": "normal", "style": "", "text": "A service available in every state that helps individuals, families, and small businesses shop for and enroll in affordable medical insurance.", "type": "text", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "paragraph", "version": 1}], "direction": "ltr", "format": "", "indent": 0, "type": "root", "version": 1}}
